paper_title: On optimal rate of convergence in periodic homogenization of forced mean curvature flow of graphs in the laminar setting
abstract: In this paper, we obtain the optimal rate of convergence in periodic homogenization of forced graphical mean curvature flows in the laminated setting. We prove that a rate of convergence is $O(\varepsilon^{1/2})$ as $\varepsilon\to0^+$, and we show by examples that this rate of convergence $O(\varepsilon^{1/2})$ as $\varepsilon\to0^+$ is optimal.
